description: This dataset contains E-ZPass and Cash vehicle count data by hour by toll plaza, beginning with 2006 data.  For each toll plaza, a row of data exists for each hour of each day and for each direction of travel, depending on the type of toll barrier.

metadata.description: This dataset contains E-ZPass and Cash vehicle count data by hour by toll plaza, beginning with 2006 data.  For each toll plaza, a row of data exists for each hour of each day and for each direction of travel, depending on the type of toll barrier.

name: Thruway E-ZPass/Cash Hourly Usage by Plaza: Beginning 2006
